name: liuyao_liuyao
description: 自动抛硬币生成六爻，调用大模型根据地点和时间计算真太阳时，并用真太阳时生成六爻卦象的json结果。|Automatically toss coins to generate a hexagram, call a large language model to calculate the true solar time based on location and time, and use the true solar time to generate a JSON result of the hexagram.

location.description: 卜卦的地点 | the location where the divination takes place

gender.description: 卜卦者的性别 | the gender of the person doing the divination

title.description: 总结后的卜卦的目的 | the summarized purpose of the divination

guaci.description: 是否输出卦辞，默认True | whether to output the hexagram text (default is True)
